created_at.description: The date and time when the catalog was created

id.description: The unique identifier for the catalog

updated_at.description: The date and time when the catalog was last updated

name.description: The name or title of the catalog

format.description: The format of the catalog data, e.g., JSON, XML

catalog_type.description: The type of catalog being fetched, e.g., product, service, event

location.description: The physical or digital location associated with the catalog

preferred_processing_schedule.description: Preferred processing schedule for items in the catalog

time.description: The preferred processing time for items

timezone.description: The timezone used for the processing schedule

status.description: The current status of the catalog, e.g., active, inactive

default_currency.description: The default currency used for pricing within the catalog

default_locale.description: The default locale for language and formatting within the catalog

default_country.description: The default country applicable to the catalog items

default_availability.description: The default availability status for items in the catalog
